summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal water system of The City of Seattle; converting Local Improvement District No. 6725 to Utility Local Improvement District No. 6725; specifying and adopting a system or plan of additions to and betterments and extensions of the municipal water system; declaring the estimated cost thereof as near as may be; authorizing the issuance and sale of water revenue bonds in the principal amount of approximately $2,700,000 to obtain the funds with which to pay the costs of such system or plan; creating certain special funds; and authorizing the issuance and sale of short-term obligations to pay part of the costs of constructing improvements within Utility Local Improvement District No. 6725 pending the sale of such revenue bonds and fixing the terms thereof.
